name: Psych-Ore
description:
Use WASD to move, F to Mine, Left Mouse to Throw.

Dowload the game for a better experience!

DESCRIPTION:

A tough as nails adventure as a psychic miner trys to claim his sandwich from the skeletons who stole it. We tried to make something a little chaotic, you can tell us whether we succeded or not. The game goes for a 320 x 224 resolution, to give it more of a Mega Drive feel.

CREDITS:

Developed by SilviaFox for the Brackeys 2021.2 game jam.

Art by the talented crew of:

  • UsagiDood
  • StarDrop
  • Vgf88

Thank you to them for helping throughout the project!

External Tools used:
Lean Tween and SFXR
